objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Display_Order__c, ProgramApi__Parent_Program_Type__c, ProgramApi__Program_Profile_Instructions__c, ProgramApi__Program_Profile_Page_Title__c, ProgramApi__Program_Type_Name__c FROM ProgramApi__Program_Type__c

SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Active__c, ProgramApi__Candidate_Term__c, ProgramApi__Custom_Link_Label__c, ProgramApi__Designation__c, ProgramApi__Entity__c, ProgramApi__Goal_Display_Field_Set__c, ProgramApi__Maintenance_Term__c, ProgramApi__Progam_Name__c, ProgramApi__Program_Type__c, ProgramApi__Programs_Description__c, ProgramApi__Progress_Bar__c FROM ProgramApi__Program__c
SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Active__c, ProgramApi__End_Date__c, ProgramApi__Is_Maintenance__c, ProgramApi__Profile__c, ProgramApi__Start_Date__c FROM ProgramApi__Program_Term__c

SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Account__c, ProgramApi__Completion_Date__c, ProgramApi__Contact__c, ProgramApi__Create_Candidate_Term__c, ProgramApi__Create_Maintenance_Term__c, ProgramApi__Custom_Link_URL__c, ProgramApi__Hide_Program_Profile__c, ProgramApi__Name__c, ProgramApi__Program__c, ProgramApi__SalesOrderLineId__c, ProgramApi__Status__c FROM ProgramApi__Program_Profile__c

SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Dependency__c, ProgramApi__Display_Order__c, ProgramApi__End_Date__c, ProgramApi__Goal_Button_Label__c, ProgramApi__Maintenance__c, ProgramApi__Navigation_URL__c, ProgramApi__Program__c, ProgramApi__Published__c, ProgramApi__Requirement_Description__c, ProgramApi__Requirement_Name__c, ProgramApi__Requirement_Type__c, ProgramApi__Start_Date__c FROM ProgramApi__Requirement__c

SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Goal_Description__c, ProgramApi__Navigation_URL__c, ProgramApi__Profile_Account__c, ProgramApi__Profile_Contact__c, ProgramApi__Program_Profile__c, ProgramApi__Publish__c, ProgramApi__Requirement_Title__c, ProgramApi__Requirement__c, ProgramApi__Result__c, ProgramApi__Status__c, ProgramApi__Term__c FROM ProgramApi__Goals__c
